SET 0x1000, 7
SET 0x1004, 15
SET 0x1008, 3
SET 0x1010, 4
ADD 0x1004, 0x1000
LOOP 0x1008, 0x1010
SET 0x1020, 20
SUB 0x1020, 0x1000
CMP 0x1020, 0x1004
SET 0x2000, 16
JMP 0x2000
NOP
SET 0x2004, 8
ADD 0x2000, 0x2004
CMP 0x2000, 0x1000
NOP
SET 0x3000, 12
SET 0x3004, 5
SUB 0x3000, 0x3004
CMP 0x3000, 0x1000
NOP
EXIT
